entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RyuJIT: Improving multi-dimensional array accesses #60785
    Future
  • Some .NET 6 runtime assemblies are not R2R images #60782
  • [API Proposal]: Add BigInteger support to System.Text.Json #60780
    7.0.0
  • Add generate crash report flag (and other flags) to WriteDump diagnostics IPC message #60775
    6.0.1
  • HttpStress and SslStress builds are broken on Windows #60769
  • BufferBlock<T>.Completion never completes in specific scenario #60768
  • `new StackTrace()` inside async methods -> Useless, Lack of frames with sync caller method (initiator) #60764
  • Allow customizing letter case size when serializing Unicode characters #60762
  • dotnet 6 rc.2: libhostpolicy.dylib library load disallowed by system policy #60760
  • [API Proposal]: Add ability to get Caller MethodInfo from any code at runtime #60759
  • Linux: NativeLibrary.TryLoad terminates the process when handle parameter does not a real handle to library. #60758
  • [Loc]With .NET6 RTM SDK installed, the texts in CLI are partly unlocalized after running "dotnet --info" #60756
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexCultureTests.TestIgnoreCaseRelationBorderCasesInNonBacktracking(options: NonBacktracking) #60753
    7.0.0
  • Unexpected TimeSeriesLimitReached after HistogramLimitReached #60752

Closed

  • CI failure in profiler.elt.XUnitWrapper test #60790
  • Test failure System.Drawing.Tests.PenTests.Ctor_Brush_Width<SolidBrush>(brush: SolidBrush { Color = Color [Red] }, width: -∞, expectedPenType: SolidColor) #60751
  • System.Text.Json - can't serialize exception #43026
    Future
  • [android] interpreter does not run Java/C# object finalizers in some cases #60638
    6.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Indexer to Vectors #59924
    7.0.0
  • Single/Double/Half/Decimal need more test cases for parsing #48119
    Future
  • [blazor] [wasm] Unable to debug after redirect to oidc #60613
    7.0.0
  • ',' is invalid after a single JSON value. Expected end of data. #30405
    Future
  • Are .Net 6.0 dll-s distributed in R2R format? #60779
  • Add System.Text.Json support for BigInteger #60763
    7.0.0
  • Add support for Date/TimeOnly to STJ #51302
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: Improving parsing error experience #51238
    Future
  • JsonSerializerOptions.WriteIndividualObjects #38344
    Future
  • [System.Text.Json] Utf8JsonReader/Writer should support TimeSpan #32965
    Future
  • System.Text.Json support a way to ignore/handle exceptions on serialization #44390
    Future
  • The JSON value could not be converted - Model with nullable DateTime #434
    Future
  • [DllImportGenerator] Remove unnecessary initialization of return values in generated code #60698
    7.0.0
  • DllImportGererator.Unit.Tests Workitem failed in PR with JIT assert #60772
  • System.Text.JsonSerializer - Provide a mechanism to begin deseralization at a specific name/value pair. #49598
    Future
  • Add an option in System.Text.Json to allow control characters within string values #49455
    Future
  • Regressions in Benchstone.BenchI.EightQueens #60629
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CtorFromCollection<String> #60627
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in SeekUnroll #60626
    7.0.0
  • linq OrderBy<string>() with "-" #60761
  • Add ’root namespace of an assembly‘ API #55791
    Future
  • About the invalid problem that 'Process.GetProcesses().Contains(Process.GetCurrentProcess())'. #56763
    Future
  • Test failure profiler/multiple/multiple/multiple.sh #57906
    7.0.0
  • Analyzer / fixer proposal: Prefer static HashData methods over ComputeHash #40579
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable a couple of pen tests on Windows on release/6.0 #60789
    area-System.Drawing
  • ci arm test #60788
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Hide 'align' instruction behind jmp #60787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More stack overflow avoidance in regex NonBacktracking #60786
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Optimize PersianCalendar.AddMonths calculations #60778
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Fix mono_get_generic_context_from_stack_frame when it's from a dim. #60770
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • add unit test for variable length encoding HTTP/3 #60766
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • Fix libs.tests build with gcc #60757
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add AggressiveInlining attribute to multi-dimension array helpers #60750

Merged

  • Use Math.CopySign in CalendricalCalculationsHelper #60776
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Maui File location and target runtime updates #60784
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • API Implementation: Add Indexer to Vectors #60517
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Improve IndexOfAny(byte,byte,byte) #40894
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Disable tests that are failing with JIT asserts on ARM64 #60773
    disabled-test, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix loading a non wasm page and then returning to a wasm page. #60777
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.0
  • [release/5.0] Add check for running under translation to mac installers #60771
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/5.0] Remove duplicate entries from dotnet --info #60496
    Servicing-approved, area-Host
  • Remove xunit-performance dependency in tests #60711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix loading a non wasm page and then returning to a wasm page. #60688
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [DllImportGenerator] Remove unnecessary initialization of variables in generated code #60748
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Remove exclusions to bad paths #60744
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Turn off reloc generation for handles #60721
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add general multi-dimensional array test #60749
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify runtime test projects #60724
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable additional llvmfullaot Linux_arm64 CI lane #60730
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add limited support for backtracking Regex single char loops to simplified code gen #60385
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Fix GCC warnings in test build #60734
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Updated tests regarding issue #48119 #52994
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, 7.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: some enhancements to redundant branch opts #60732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][EXPERIMENT] [wasm][aot] link with O1 #60739
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [hackathon] [testonly] ValueArray - a compliment type to the Span, which owns its data without indirections. #60608
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Implement `GT_AND_NOT` for ARM/ARM64 #59881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60561
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.1
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOSSimulator #58870
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.1
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #59389
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Test stateless pools #60704
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Do not throw StackOverflow exception from `ChangeToken.OnChange` #60198
    area-Extensions-Primitives
  • Use preferred region from PAL for JIT reloc hints #60747
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update SDK to 6.0 RC2 #60256
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add HttpClient.PatchAsJsonAsync() apis #60672
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Attempt to fix observed AV in mark_through_cards_for_segments #60617
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Allow interp->jit transitions for generic methods. #60461
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] <EnablePreviewFeatures> for HttpStress #60682
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60723
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • [WIP] Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Port dotnet/sdk SourceBuild patches from dotnet/installer #22281
  • Nuget package with multiple content tfm:s doesn't work with package reference #22280
  • .Net SDK 6.0 RC2 has incorrect editor config files for AnalysisLevel 5 #22276
  • Cannot update dotnet workload maui on mac #22267
  • Communicate plans with the community about the future of .NET debugging and feedback loops (Removal of dotnet watch?) #22265
  • Fail to setup 5.0.403 arm64 SDK(November update) on win-arm64 with error this product not support on arm64 #22261
  • .NET 6 RC 2 PublishReadyToRun=true causes TypeLoadException at MethodInfo.GetCustomAttributes(bool) in certain conditions #22258

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch the non-windows test builds to also run helix and non-helix in parallel. #22284
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22279
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve loading of Roslyn assemblies on validate package task #22277
    Area-Compatibility
  • Revert "Remove Hot Reload support from dotnet watch (#22217)" #22262

Merged

  • Revive skipped / scoped tests #21181
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [ASP.NET Core] Updates the license headers for Razor files #20699
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22233
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Integration tests failed due to "language server has not yet been asked to shutdown" #57331
  • Integration test failure due to concurrent collection modification in light bulb #57330
  • Integration tests fail to trigger light bulb #57328
  • Integration tests fail to wait for code action application (or silent failure) #57327
  • Integration tests fail to wait for async light bulb #57326
  • [In, Out] attributes removed from extern local function parameters #57325
    17.1
  • Differences detected in solution checksum in integration tests #57324
  • Smart line break doesn't respect indent_style #57323
  • Light bulb menu showed up over Pick Members dialog #57321
  • CS8604 Null reference false positive with two nullable objects #57320
  • Typo in DocumentPullDiagonsticHandlerProvider file name and class name #57319

Closed

  • Failed to set foreground window in integration tests #57322
  • Fixer to add project-level nullable enable option #52893
    Backlog
  • Completion test fails due to latency guard #57329
  • Analyzers not being recognized in Dev17 Preview 6 #57293
  • About VS TaskList function suggestion #55455

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix 'AssemblyVersion overridden by auto-generated version' warning in build #57338
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Compute val escape for list patterns #57336
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57335
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #57334
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57332
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • [LSP] Fix race in document change tracker when used in non-mutating requests. #57317
    Area-IDE, LSP

Merged

  • Add ServiceHub core host integration test CI #57228
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add Features projects to SourceBuild #57277
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • modify test to account for new option behavior #57333
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Implement 'Enable nullable reference types' refactoring #57200
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Next
  • Switch to 1ES build pools release/dev17.0 #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move skeleton ref caching to ProjectStates #57158
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Pass completion options explicitly throughout the implementation of completion providers #57058
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Don't compute the information for the code definition window if not open #57307
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57266
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #57284
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Fix a race condition in CompilationWithAnalyzers #57260
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Retry SetForegroundWindow with DTE.MainWindow #57314
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • If Length and Count are both present, only the former is assumed to be non-negative #57268
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Implement an LspWorkspaceManager and modify how we fork documents in LSP. #57140
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Options5 #57254
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • List patterns: main IDE scenarios and AddRequiredParens #53850
    Area-IDE, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Compute val escape for extended property patterns #57211
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Extended Property Patterns
  • handle null project paths in solution #57234
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the BranchId concept from teh workspace #57132
    Area-IDE
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [WIP] Use cached delegate instances for method group conversions #6642
    Language-C#, Area-Compilers, Blocked, cla-already-signed, Community
  • List patterns: counterexample for non-exhaustive switch expressions #55327
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1.P1
  • Interpolated string handler IOperation support #56276
    Area-Analyzers
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Options refactoring #57139
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • [LSP] Add semantic tokens benchmarks + improve edit algorithm #57231
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Cleanup old workaround for arcadesdk #45105
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Binder.CreateConversion - Report use-site diagnostics for the entire conversion hierarchy. #57175
    Area-Compilers
  • Disable async lightbulbs for 17.0 #57169
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, Needs UX Triage
  • Initial fix for issue "VB Formatting of LineContinuation Wrong after _ ' Comment" #54559
    Area-IDE, Community
  • List patterns: IOperation #56008
    Area-Compilers
  • Add diags to help us diagnose lightbulb issues better #57312
    Area-IDE
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Integration tests for analyzers that use MS.CA.CSharp.Workspaces and MS.CA.VB.Workspaces #57305
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Add feature flag to enable LSP classifications in local scenarios #57291
    Area-IDE, LSP

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collaboration model proposal #37786
  • Quarantining `BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_AzureActiveDirectoryTemplate_Works` #37782
  • Change the log level for static web assets to Minimal #37779
  • .NET 6 exception incorrectly refers to startup and ConfigureServices #37778
    6.0.x
  • [.NET 6] Blazor cannot find member named xxx while debugging #37777
  • Question: Does RCL support changing wwwroot path? #37775
  • QUESTION: CustomModelBinder does not work on properties of the Dto/ViewModel #37774
  • Hot-Reload in VS very slow; but very fast with dotnet watch #37773
  • Blazor Tip: using Javascript in a more structured way by using extension methods #37772
  • SignalR doesn't always display content when rendering a page in Blazor Server #37771

Closed

  • Blazor app won't compile due to auto-generated __Blazor namespaces #36326
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Problem with razor code generation with named tuples #37209
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Razor generates code that doesn't compile when using generic components and RenderFragments #31263
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Need to custom the tag's close type in the Blazor. #37303
    .NET 7 Planning
  • @functions block in .razor file loses all language support if preceded by an unmatched < #37301
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Indefinite NullPointerException in Razor #37269
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Razor compiler `Unclosed div` within `@if` #24907
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Resolve failing full framework tests with incremental RSG #33796
    6.0-docs-infra
  • TestServer HttpClient isn't able to handle redirect to external url #37742
    Backlog
  • Update the compiler version referenced by Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor #36682
    6.0.0
  • Deflake port binding tests #27401
    Next sprint planning
  • Flaky test: Libuv.BindTests ListenAnyIP_IPv6_Success #25403
    Backlog
  • Quarantined test: RegisterIPEndPoint_DynamicPort_Success(endPoint: [::]:0, testUrl: "http://127.0.0.1") #26626
    Next sprint planning
  • Flaky test: ServerShutsDownWhenMainExitsStress #28994
    Next sprint planning
  • AddressRegistrationTests are unreliable #33204
    Next sprint planning
  • Blazor: Changes in a dependent project do not trigger a recompile. #37722
  • Blazor WASM - Lazy Loading and Dependency Injection #37695

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ua-parser-js #37785
    area-signalr
  • Quarantine `BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_AzureActiveDirectoryTemplate_Works` #37783
    area-mvc
  • Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37781
    area-signalr
  • [SPA] Updates npm dependencies #37776
    area-mvc
  • Replace NoHotReloadListenersAreOrdinarilyRegistered with unit tests #37768
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Reuse NegotiateMetadata #36184
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix typo in Web API template option description #37780
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Update to stable Roslyn versions (#37663) #37764
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Continue using HashCodeCombiner in Razor.Language #37725
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md #37696
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Enable retry for bind tests #37754
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Make tests for FileLoggerProcessor system time independent #37755
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Helix] Switch to win11 for pr checks #37712
    area-infrastructure
  • Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix AppHost pack prebuilt usage in source-build #37760
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet workload install maui-android failing #3091
  • [Bug] AbsoluteLayout doesn't update bounds for its children after being initially set #3090
  • [Bug] Handlers not working #3089
  • [Bug] Unable to install workloads #3087
  • [Bug] Evaluate use of string comparisons inside Maui.Core #3085
    6.0.200-preview.12
  • [Bug] Windows clipping ran amok #3083
  • [Bug] Ain't no shadow like a Windows shadow #3082
  • Clip property is not working properly after MAUI preview 9 release #3081
  • [Enhancement] IBorderElement.CornerRadius should be CornerRadius type #3080
  • [Bug] Toolbar item on a content page behaves different on platforms #3079
  • [Bug] Shell.ForegroundColor in UWP diferent from other platforms #3078
  • [Bug] Shell.BackgroundColor in UWP and iOS #3077
  • [Bug] Shell TitleColor in UWP #3076
  • [Bug] Consuming WCF Service Problem System.Servicemodel #3073

Closed

  • Update Blazor Desktop templates to final .NET 6 content before we ship #1645
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • Update .NET MAUI Blazor template to align with content in the latest .NET 6 Blazor templates #2507
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • Label's Shadow #1994

  • [Spec] #3072

  • [Enhancement] YOUR IDEA! #3071
  • # [The feature] #3074

  • [Spec] Border #12

  • [Spec] Shadows #9

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix placeholder on iOS Editor so it doesn't overlap when text is present when text is set in code #3086

Merged

  • Use app div instead of app tag for Blazor templates #3066

  • Fix multiline InputType on IEditor #3084
  • Add `ITextButton` and related Mappers #2868
    area/controls 🎮
  • Ensure ScrollView performs cross-platform measure #3050
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix Shell Fragment Container #3068
    area/shell 🐢
  • Remove IPlatformServices.GetHash #2707
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3069
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add Collectionview sample galleries #3047
    area/controls 🎮

Updated

  • Enable GitHub action to apply labels based on who opened the issue/PR #3055
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Move `IDispatcher` logic out of `IPlatformServices` #2862
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] CollectionView handler for android #3067
    do-not-merge
  • Maui 395 port editor autosize to handler #1202

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Contains fails with using a IReadOnlySet #26437
  • EFCore 6 - NullReferenceException upon EnsureDeleted #26436
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to build IHost when creating EF Migration with Minimal API dotnet 6 #26434
  • Migration from EF Core 3.1 to 5 - Using property Count in IReadOnlyCollection throws NullReferenceException #26433

Closed

  • Incorrect error message if the name of a not-mapped property in principal is same as the inverse property name in child. #26015
    6.0.0
  • Performance issue when using SplitQuery and QueryFilters #26315
  • Async methods blocking? #26425
  • InMemory provider and required properties #26404
  • Could not find method 'AddYears' on type 'System.DateOnly' #26383
  • API for graph traversal ? #26347
  • Support `ValueTuple(string, object | NpgsqlDbType)` parameters for raw sql queries #26326
  • EF Core DBContext scaffolding with custom model naming convention #26426
  • Suggestions to making QueryIterationFailed a bit more useful #26421

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix to #26344 - SqlNullabilityProcessor and COALESCE with more than two arguments #26419
  • Add Migration name check #26396
  • [6.0.1] Allow non-nullable value comparer to be applied on nullable properties #26430
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • [6.0.1] Query: Copy client projections when updating SelectExpression #26431
    Servicing-consider

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Global tool not working when x64 and amd64 installed side by side on M1 Mac #12187

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/5.0.2xx] Backport x64 on ARM64 installer changes #12494
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • [ArPow] dotnet/format: Fix ref-only extensions package usage at runtime #12493
  • Prepare source-build for prebuiltless build #12483
  • Revert "[release/6.0.1xx] Temporarily revert implicit versions to produce new stage0" #12495
